resources.string: The purpose of this Android application is to demonstrate the skills of the author. It is created by Mario Genchev Koshnicharov. It also supports Bulgarian language.

This Activity shares one header and one footer. The application creates it\'s own style in the style.xml file. The colors are defined in color.xml. The "strings" folder includes the texts in both languages.
Enter your name and your email to open a new Activity. This will not register any data.
Your data was successfully passed to the other Activity.
